meanings.definition: A lens or mirror that is not perfectly spherical.
meanings.sent1: The photographer used an aspheric lens to capture the detailed texture of the flower petal.
meanings.sent2: The astronomer adjusted the aspheric mirror to focus the light from distant stars.
meanings.sent3: The aspheric lens rolled off the table and bounced comically on the floor.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an aspheric mirror, reflecting back distorted memories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The aspheric telescope revealed a distorted view of the moon, unlike anything seen before.
